page.title: 14Population
page.content: When we started to count the people in our block we were not sure how to tackle it. We decided to ask the Parish Council to help us with the people over 18 who were on the Electoral Roll and we approached the village doctor, Dr.Rider who gave us the number of people under 18 from his computer records. We finally asked the whole school who did not go to Dr. Rider and our total came to 1,949. In the 1841 census there were 820 people living in the village. We also found out in a survey in our class that 29 mums or dads leave the village for work each day and 10 stay in the village for work and 21 actually stay at home.
